item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:14, topic:282998”]seriously You guys flame and spam way to much…

The answer was given:

Check your Client.Java and search for the Item ID and edit the stats it has.

Now, before it gets worse

/modlocktopic[/quote]You are such a wannabe mod…

like in rsc you can edit the items strength bonus attack bonus def bonus mage bonus etc.
im assuming you would do that in the item configuration or the client.java file
